replies.bodyText:
Ok it seems InFunction ;-)
By the way I have a question.
What about  this expression
type = 'geotools' or version > 20 and language = 'it'
Is geotools internal function evaluator is able to manage precedence between  or and and op ?
or should I build a  tree to manage that ?
replies.author: ebocher

replies.bodyText: Functions do not have precedence, they are applied in the order they are called.
replies.author: aaime

replies.bodyText: So after looking on Function mechanism, I think you can merge this PR. The setting up of the function precedence should be left to the developer's appreciation.
